constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 相邻节点取值不同（图着色约束）

constraints.name: coloring_count_constraint
constraints.description: 图的3-着色数量必须恰好为 6k

constraints.name: initial_graph_size_limit
constraints.description: 初始图的顶点数不超过 19

constraints.name: additional_edges_limit
constraints.description: 每种 k 值下，可以添加的边数不超过 17

constraints.name: edge_uniqueness
constraints.description: 所有边必须是唯一的，不能有自环
